name: S.S.Culinarium
description:
Our first game ever, and first programming experience.
Please leave feedback on our first game.

In S.S.culinarium you play as an space chef, trying to complete recipes in zero-g, with the ingredients flying around the space-kitchen.

The controls are the arrow keys.

Your objective is to follow the recipe that appears on the bottom of the screen, and avoid the others ingredients.


This is just a prototype, however, we figured this was enough to be playable.
